topics.body:
"@Shadow_the_Hedgehog":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5433546963687240e43e0100#post_5433546963687240e43e0100
!http://cartoon.mthai.com/wordpress/wp-content/uploads/2012/03/Uchuu_Keiji_Gavan_2.jpg!
Gavan is a space cop. (Allegedly, The director of robocop Saw an episode of Gavan when he was in japan)

Alex murphy is stuck with that ensemble, Retsu can Have the suit beamed onto him from his spaceship with a fancy pose.

Admittedly, Jiban is a lot like Robocop, But They are quite different in execution.
